issue.title: [CF 1051] crush wow after changing the font
issue.body:
happens when you change the font.
More detail: youtube.com/watch?v=z5udkTwFPh0


> Posted by CurseForge user darka | Imported from CurseForge issue #1051 | Raw

comments.body:
Its actually an issue that's been in the WoW game client for quite a while: http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/tickets/772-monochrome-font-outline-crashes-game/

I've gone ahead and just removed the monochrome outline option from TMW since it seem unlikely that Blizzard will ever fix it at this point after it being broken for so long.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
